title: German Kaesespaetzle
ingredients: ['3 eggs', '225g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '125ml water', '60ml vegetable oil', '2 onions, halved and sliced', '325g grated Gruyere or Emmentaler cheese', '1 tablespoon vinegar', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley, for garnish']
